```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyRSS,dplyr,DT,purrr,stringr,lubridate)
fnam <- list.files("data","*.RDS")
firstm <- map_dfr(fnam,~{
  file.path("data",.x) %>% readRDS()
}) %>% distinct()
```

:::{.column-page}

```{r}
# firstm %>%
#   mutate(website=paste0("[", item_title, "](http://", item_link, ")")) %>%
#   select(-c(item_link,item_title)) %>%
#   knitr::kable()

firstm %>%

  # to show hyper link at the end
  mutate(
    pub_date=as.Date(feed_last_build_date,format="%Y-%m-%d"),
    website=
           str_glue("{item_title}, <strong> <a target = '_blank' href = '{item_link}'> >></a></strong>")) %>%
  select(-c(item_link,item_title,item_description,feed_last_build_date)) %>%
  DT::datatable(., filter = 'top', escape = FALSE, rownames = FALSE,
                options = list(
                  search = list(regex = TRUE, caseInsensitive = TRUE),
                  pageLength = 25,
                  lengthMenu = c(25, 50, 100, 200),
                  autowidth = TRUE,
                  columnDefs = list(
                    list(width = '80%', targets = list(2)))
                )
  )
```
